name: Touhou Super Ski
description:
Cirno's snowball got a little out of hand! Race to the bottom while avoiding obstacles to get to safety.

Controls are A/D or left and right arrow keys.

Made in Processing for the Touhou Game Jam 10 https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-10 with love by Brez and Prez

v2 fixed a bug where map 3 wouldn't play as normal, nothing else (brez was upset abt it). the original files are still there, not much difference
